oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Foods manufacturing and Processing: The New Way of Life
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jalan, Vishal
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Processing, packaging and transportation
India
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic is the fastest growing sector of the food industry with global sales approaching US $40 billion in 2006. Growing health-consciousness among consumers globally has resulted in high demand for Fresh and more importantly Processed Organic Food. This value-addition can generate large number of jobs in rural areas in India and Africa.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jalan, Vishal (2007) Organic Foods manufacturing and Processing: The New Way of Life. Speech at: India-Africa Agrifood Summit by FICCI, Hotel Crowne Plaza, New Friends Colony, New Delhi, India, 7-8 March 2007.
